description: Mid-week meal prep just got easy with this delightful dinner recipes. Make this succulent grilled chicken breast and vibrant beetroot salad in 15 minutes.
name: Grilled Chicken With Beet & Onion Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tsp Woolworths extra virgin olive oil

recipeInstructions.text: Rub chicken with oil, then season with pepper. Heat a chargrill pan over high heat. Grill chicken and onion for 6 minutes, turning, or until chicken is cooked through and onion is charred and tender.
Meanwhile, place beetroot, spinach and chickpeas in a bowl and toss to combine.
Combine aioli and 2 tsp water in a small bowl. Arrange salad and chicken on a plate. Top with onion and drizzle with aioli. Season with pepper. Serve scattered with mint.
